{{Dialogue Start}}

:'''Read:''' Tired from work? Suffering from mental fatigue? Plagued by all manner of anxieties, or feeling unwell?

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A shop established by the [[Knights of Favonius]] to promote the achievements of alchemy. [[Lisa]] is in charge of overall management, while [[Albedo]] and [[Sucrose]] provide technical support and equipment. The shop has procured ingredients to cultivate, and has facilities for concocting and brewing potions as well as stocking and sales, making it a comprehensive, one-stop shop for making and selling potions. Skilled alchemists can certainly efficiently manufacture large quantities of wondrous potions here...}}
